mapper.select: SELECT tuser.account, username, passwd, permission FROM ((tuser LEFT JOIN user_role ON user_role.account = tuser.account) LEFT JOIN role_permission ON role_permission.roleId = user_role.roleId) LEFT JOIN permission ON permissionId = permission.Id WHERE tuser.account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL SELECT tadmin.account, adminname AS username, passwd, permission FROM ((tadmin LEFT JOIN user_role ON user_role.account = tadmin.account) LEFT JOIN role_permission ON role_permission.roleId = user_role.roleId) LEFT JOIN permission ON permissionId = permission.Id WHERE tadmin.account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
